privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.generalText: The protection of your personal data is of particular concern to us. This privacy policy informs you about the nature, scope and purpose of the processing of personal data by this website.
privacy.responsibleText: Responsible for data processing on this website is xMethface. Contact: support@partymotivator.dev
privacy.dataCollectionText: This website does not collect any personal data. No cookies are used for tracking purposes and no analytics services such as Google Analytics are integrated.
privacy.serverLogsText: The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us. These are: browser type and browser version, operating system used, referrer URL, hostname of the accessing computer, time of the server request, IP address. These data cannot be assigned to specific persons.
privacy.addonText: The PartyMotivator addon processes and stores data exclusively locally on your computer within the World of Warcraft game. No data is sent to external servers or shared with third parties.
privacy.rightsText: Since we do not process personal data, most GDPR rights do not apply. If you still have questions, you can contact us at any time.
privacy.changesText: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy as needed. You can always find the current version on this page.
privacy.privacyRespect: This website respects your privacy and does not collect any personal data.
